en: Alright, let's see...
According to my notes...
I need to move the desks to the sides in all three classrooms.
zh_TW: 我需要把一共三間教室的桌子移到旁邊。

en: Then I can draw a "path" in the middle of each one with chalk.
zh_TW: 接著我可以用粉筆在每間教室中間畫出一條"路徑"。

en: Well, I'll leave the chalk drawing for last. I want to gather everything I need first.
zh_TW: 好吧，我會把用粉筆畫線留到最後。我想要先收集所有必要的東西。

en: Oh no...
What are you doing...? Is this part of the ritual?
zh_TW: 妳在做什麼…？這也是儀式的一部分嗎？

en: Um... what's wrong with you?
If this ritual involves the mass genocide of harmless plants, then I want nothing to do with it.
zh_TW: 如果這個儀式包含了無害植物大屠殺，那我不想和它有任何關係。

en: Agreed.
Are you seriously going to go around killing all the plants?
zh_TW: 妳真的打算到處殺死這些植物？

en: I knew you were a psychopath...
Sorry Kat, but we didn't sign up for this.
zh_TW: 抱歉凱特，我們打算不參加了。

en: I don't like this ritual anymore...
zh_TW: 我開始不喜歡這個儀式了…

en: Don't worry Kaya, we're going home now.
zh_TW: 別擔心香耶，我們要回家了。

en: Don't talk to us again.
Shelves for the students to place their school bags.
There are no bags right now though.
Everything's ready.
All that's left is to wait 5 minutes and then burn the hair.
zh_TW: 現在只要等 5 分鐘再把頭髮燒掉。

en: This is going to be such a pain to clean up.
Seriously? Stop messing with things!
But everything I "mess with" ends up being a scam.
zh_TW: 可是我"惹上"的東西最後都只是騙人的。

en: What if some day it isn't?
zh_TW: 如果哪天不是騙人的呢？

en: What if you end up summoning some ghost or the devil and condemning your soul to an eternity in the netherworld?
zh_TW: 如果妳召喚了什麼妖魔鬼怪然後把妳送到十八層地獄呢？

en: What if your soul is already damned!?
zh_TW: 如果妳早就被詛咒了呢！？

en: Then I guess that's what's waiting for me after I die.
zh_TW: 那我大概會在死後受到報應吧。

en: KAT!
It was a joke!
You're not gonna find him this way, you know?
zh_TW: 妳這樣是找不到他的，妳知道吧？

en: You'll just do whatever you want no matter what I say, won't you?
zh_TW: 不管我說什麼妳都不會改變吧？

en: It's possible.
Stubborn idiot.
I prefer "ambitious idiot".
So... will you tell me where the letter is?
zh_TW: 那…妳可以告訴我那封信在哪嗎？

en: You exhaust me Kat, you know that?
And yet here we are.
zh_TW: 然而我們現在還在說話。

en: Fine. You win. It's in the occult club.
zh_TW: 好吧。妳贏了。信在超自然研究社。

en: There's a golden envelope in one of the drawers. But they won't let you sniff around since you're not a member.
zh_TW: 其中一個抽屜裡有金色信封。不過他們不會讓你到處亂翻，因為妳不是社員。

en: Thanks, you're the best!
Huh?
(Is there somebody at the door..?)
Alright, now I just have to blow the candles off. So let's-
zh_TW: 好，現在我只要把蠟燭吹熄。來…

en: Huh? The candles... Did they just...?
...I guess I should count to 100...
(Why am I doing this? This ridiculous game couldn't possibly work.)
zh_TW: (我在做什麼？這可笑的遊戲怎麼可能會有用。)

en: (I wonder if mom is worried about me...)
(Huh? What was that?)
(What's all that noise!?)
Is anyone there...?
So... I... open my eyes?
It... worked?
It worked?
It worked!! I can't believe it!
This is incredible!!
But... where am I?
It's a... hallway? It definitely isn't the school.
zh_TW: 這裡是…走廊？絕對不是在學校。

en: This is unbelievable, how could it have worked?
zh_TW: 太不可思議了，為什麼這會有用？

en: It doesn't make any logical sense. I was in the classroom a minute ago. Have I gone mad?
zh_TW: 這沒道理啊。我剛剛還在教室裡。我是發瘋了嗎？

en: THIS IS SO EXCITING, I CAN'T BELIEVE IT WORKED!
zh_TW: 太讓我興奮了，沒想到會有用！

en: If I wake up from this and it turns out to be a dream... well... that would be disappointing, to say the least.
zh_TW: 如果我醒來發現這只是一場夢…那麼…我會很失望，至少可以這麼說。

en: Okay. I definitely need to check this place out.
Do you wish to save your progress?
Yes
No
Now what?
Now we just wait 5 minutes.
zh_TW: 現在我們要等 5 分鐘。

en: Doing nothing?
Peace and quiet are not as bad as you imagine.
After that, I'll burn the hair and you help me blow out the candles one by one.
zh_TW: 在那之後，我會把頭髮燒掉，然後妳們幫我把蠟燭一根一根吹熄。

en: Burnt hair smells bad...
It does.
But it's the last step, might as well do it right.
zh_TW: 不過這是最後一步，最好好好做完。

en: What happens then?
No idea.
Really?
We probably just clean up and go home. These rituals are a scam, you know?
zh_TW: 大概就把這裡清理乾淨再回家。妳們不知道這種儀式都是騙人的？

en: So... you're just making us make a mess, so that we can help you clean it up?
zh_TW: 所以…妳只是讓我們把這裡搞得一團亂，再讓我們幫妳清理乾淨？

en: What's the matter, are you not entertained?
zh_TW: 怎麼了，妳覺得不好玩嗎？

en: ...Tsk.
I think it's time.
Finally!
Now I just burn this...
Quickly, put out the candles now!
Now, shut your eyes and be quiet while I count to one hundred, okay?
zh_TW: 現在，把眼睛閉上並保持安靜讓我數到一百，可以嗎？

en: Got it.
Alright then, I'll start.
Shhh!
(What the hell was that!?)
Huh...?
What the...?
Are those...?
Well... my lines aren't perfect, but it should do the job!
zh_TW: 好吧…畫得不夠完美，但這應該就夠了！

en: I need to do this in all three rooms.
zh_TW: 我需要在一共三間教室都做一次。

en: Two down, one to go.
That night... I got cold feet, I guess.
zh_TW: 那天晚上…我卻步了…應該吧。

en: I went home without completing the ritual.
zh_TW: 我沒有完成儀式就回家了。

en: Despite that, I made plans to try again.
zh_TW: 儘管如此，我打算再試一次。

en: However, both my notes and the letter had disappeared without a trace.
zh_TW: 可是，我的筆記和信件都不翼而飛。

en: I tried telling myself that maybe the ritual was a scam anyways...
zh_TW: 我試著說服自己反正儀式是騙人的…

en: But now... how will I ever know?
Dead End K2 - Cold Kat Feet
zh_TW: 死路 K2 - 冰冷的貓腳 (Cold Kat Feet)

en: What's... going on?
These stairs are making no sense right now.
zh_TW: 這樓梯一點道理也沒有。

en: This building has only 3 floors. I've taken these stairs every day...
zh_TW: 這棟建築只有 3 層樓。我每天都爬著這些樓梯…

en: I must be really tired. I'll just go down without thinking.
zh_TW: 我一定是累了。接著就什麼都不想下樓吧。

en: I can't... get anywhere...
Am I dreaming right now?
I think I'll just... rest here.
zh_TW: 我想我就…在這裡休息吧。

en: Tomorrow morning... someone will wake me up.
zh_TW: 明天早上…會有人來叫醒我。

en: Hopefully at home, in my own bed.
zh_TW: 最好是在家裡，我自己的床上。

en: The next time I woke up, I was still in the same place.
zh_TW: 下一次醒來時，我還在同一個地方。

en: I tried again. Going up, going down... it made no difference.
zh_TW: 我試了又是。往上、往下…沒有任何差別。

en: I decided to make an experiment with chalk.
zh_TW: 我決定用粉筆來做個實驗。

en: Logic would dictate that this X isn't here if I go up or down a floor.
zh_TW: 邏輯上來說這個 X 記號不會在我上下樓後出現。

en: I'm... trapped...
I don't think I'm going to make it home tonight either...
zh_TW: 我想我今晚也不會回家了…

en: Sorry Mom.
Dead End K3 - Academic Spiral
zh_TW: 死路 K3 - 學術螺旋

en: And so, we went home without completing the ritual.
zh_TW: 最後，我們沒有完成儀式就回家了。

en: For some reason, I lost interest after that.
zh_TW: 不知為何，我在那之後就失去了興趣。

en: In exchange, I gained some new people to talk to.
zh_TW: 取而代之，我認識了一些可以交談的人。

en: Well, I suppose the ritual couldn't have been that important anyways.
zh_TW: 好吧，我猜那個儀式大概也沒那麼重要。

en: Dead End K4 - Nevermind Forever
zh_TW: 死路 K4 - 還是別再想了吧

en: You know, despite the rules,
zh_TW: 妳知道嗎，雖然規則寫在那裡，

en: every so often some moron thinks they can bring in an entire group.
zh_TW: 偶爾還是會有蠢蛋覺得他們可以整組進來。

en: Huh? Who's there?
Where is this place...?
I would have at least made it interesting for you.
zh_TW: 我原本還打算讓妳感到有趣。

en: But now? Forget it.
What? Wait-!
Dead End K5 - Party Wipe
Once they were gone, I felt a bit guilty so I went home as well.
zh_TW: 她們走了之後，我感到有點過意不去所以也回家了。

en: Maybe I'll try the ritual again, some other time.
zh_TW: 也許我可以之後再試試這個儀式。

en: Next time, I hope not to run into anyone.
zh_TW: 下一次，希望不會遇到其他人。

en: Dead End K6 - Snip snip
zh_TW: 死路 K6 - 喀擦喀擦

en: And so, we left the school and walked home.
zh_TW: 最後，我們離開學校並走路回家。

en: No one said anything for a while.
zh_TW: 一段時間都沒有人說話。

en: (I think Kat is feeling down...)
(Yeah.)
(Should we do something?)
(What's on your mind?)
(I don't know...)
(Do you think Kat likes to sing?)
(Hmmm...)
(Good idea, Saki!)
(Haven't seen you this excited about karaoke before, Kaya...)
zh_TW: (沒看過妳對唱卡拉OK這麼興奮，香耶…)

en: (That's a yes, then?)
(Alright.)
So...
We were thinking of going to this place...
(I can't do this! She's ignoring me!)
Kat!
Hmm?
Come with us.
Huh?
Just come.
Sure, whatever.
(You're so good!)
(Are they trying... to cheer me up...?)
(Maybe... things are better this way.)
(I need to believe that much, at least.)
Dead End K7 - Girls' Night Out
zh_TW: 死路 K7 - 女孩的夜晚

en: I didn't hear from the voice again.
But, no matter how much I wanted to, I didn't scream for help.
zh_TW: 但是，無論我多麼想要，我仍然沒有大喊救命。

en: Someone will come for me... eventually.
zh_TW: 有人會來找到我…一定會的。

en: I just know it.
Dead End K8 - My Way
zh_TW: 死路 K8 - 我的道路

en: We're... back here?
Maybe this is the school's way of saying "You can't leave now."
zh_TW: 也許這是學校對我們說"妳們現在不能離開"的方法。

en: How can you just say something like that?
Are we going home soon...?
What are you doing? I thought you were busy.
zh_TW: 妳在做什麼？我以為妳很忙。

en: I'm just taking a break.
Is that so...
Are you scared? You're scared, aren't you?
Did you come to us for comfort?
The only scary thing here is that attitude of yours.
zh_TW: 這裡唯一可怕的是妳的態度。

en: She's still upset at you messing up our night, as you can see.
zh_TW: 她還在因為妳搗亂了我們的活動生氣，妳也看得出來。

en: It's okay to be scared...
Oh, I know! Why don't you show us your ritual as an apology?
zh_TW: 喔，我想到了！妳可以讓我們看看妳的儀式來當表達歉意？

en: I'm kind of interested, too.
Well, the rules say...
Oh come on, you don't ACTUALLY think it's gonna work, do you? It's just a game, as you said.
zh_TW: 拜託，妳不會以為這是真的吧？這只是個遊戲，就像妳說的。

en: The rules don't actually matter.
I suppose not.
Then it's decided, we will tag along with you.
zh_TW: 那就這麼決定了，我們會跟著妳。

en: You're tasked with entertaining us now.
zh_TW: 妳現在的工作是娛樂我們。

en: Well, I suppose it can't be helped.
zh_TW: 好吧，我想也沒其他辦法了。

en: Let's go, then.
I'm back in this hallway...
I don't like this... I need to get out of here...
zh_TW: 我不喜歡這裡…我必須離開這裡…

en: Whoa... weird dream.
Everyone must be gone already.
Looks like it's eleven... I should get to it.
zh_TW: 十一點了…我該開始行動了。

en: Ohhhh no...
You moved it!!
I didn't, I swear! You know I hate this type of thing!
zh_TW: 沒有，我發誓！妳知道我討厭這種東西！

en: This can't possibly be happening...
It spelled "DIE"!!-
Oh my... Oh no...
Stop joking around!! This is serious!!
zh_TW: 別開玩笑了！！我是認真的！

en: ...Aah.... we should not have played this...
I TOLD you we're going to be cursed!!
zh_TW: 我跟妳說過我們會被詛咒！！

en: WHAT WAS THAT!?
Is that a ghost?? We summoned a ghost!
zh_TW: 是鬼魂嗎？我們召喚了鬼魂！

en: oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god-
YOU'RE MAKING TOO MUCH NOISE
Oh...It's just Kat...
What's with the crazy knocking? What was that for!?
Did that spook you? You're not supposed to be here, you know?
zh_TW: 嚇到妳了嗎？妳們不該出現在這裡，知道嗎？

en: I could say the same about you. Why are YOU here?
zh_TW: 妳還不是一樣。為什麼妳在這裡？

en: Actually...
Say hello to the new member of the occult club!
zh_TW: 跟超自然研究社的新社員打招呼！

en: I had the wonderful opportunity to meet all of the members yesterday.
zh_TW: 我昨天有幸和所有社員見面。

en: I don't recall seeing you there.
zh_TW: 我不記得在那裡看到妳們。

en: You three are not part of the club, are you?
That's funny. I didn't pin you of all people as the "occult" type, Kat.
zh_TW: 真有趣。我沒想到妳是喜歡"超自然"的人，凱特。

en: That's because I'm not.
H-Hey!! We were doing something here!
I'll save you the trouble. All three of you moved it.
zh_TW: 我來幫妳們省去麻煩。妳們三個都動了它。

en: Huh?
The planchette. From your game. You all moved it. There's no ghost in the room.
zh_TW: 那個妳們用來玩遊戲的板子。妳們都動了它。這裡沒有鬼。

en: There's a simple scientific explanation: it's called the ideomotor effect.
zh_TW: 這種現象有個簡單的科學解釋：名為意念動作效應。

en: Simply put, just like your body reacts to pain reflexively, it may also react to ideas and move on its own. It pretty much bypasses the part of the brain which we use for conscious behavior.
zh_TW: 簡單來說，就像妳的身體會對疼痛做出反應，身體也會對想法反應並且自己行動。它繞過了我們大腦用來進行意識行為的部分。

en: It's not all that different from blinking or breathing. The effect is even stronger when a bunch of gullible people who are desperate to believe in ghost stories get together and play.
zh_TW: 這跟眨眼或呼吸沒什麼差別。這種效應在一群容易受影響又非常相信鬼故事的人聚在一起玩遊戲時特別強烈。

en: There was an experiment where the players were blindfolded and suddenly the "ghosts" could no longer spell messages. You can try it if you don't believe me.
zh_TW: 有個實驗讓玩家戴上眼罩後突然間"鬼魂"沒辦法再寫字了。不信的話妳們可以試試看。

en: In other words, your mysterious answers from beyond... are really just your imagination playing tricks on you.
zh_TW: 換句話說，妳們來自另一個世界的訊息…只是妳們自己的想像在作祟。

en: Great job killing the mood.
You must be fun at parties.
zh_TW: 妳在派對上一定很受歡迎。

en: Thanks a lot, Kat.
Always a pleasure.
(Alright, time to search.)
(I should go over my notes to make sure I don't forget anything.)
zh_TW: (我應該先讀過一次我的筆記以免忘了任何東西。)

en: I already have enough chalk but... the more the merrier!
zh_TW: 我的粉筆已經夠多了可是…越多越好！

en: What kind of ritual is this...?
Do I really need all of this chalk...?
zh_TW: 我真的需要這麼多粉筆嗎…？

en: This window already has curtains.
zh_TW: 這扇窗戶已經有窗簾了。

en: The thought of its burning beauty charms you.
zh_TW: 想到它燃燒的美貌讓你著迷。

en: I really shouldn't, though.
zh_TW: 不過我真的不該這麼做。

en: It looks like a private journal.
zh_TW: 看起來像是本個人日記。

en: This looks like that girl's private journal.
zh_TW: 看起來像是那個女孩的個人日記。

en: Look through it?
Yes
No
Let's see...
Blegh, it's just math problems... and girly doodles all over.
zh_TW: 呃，只有數學問題…還有女孩子的塗鴉。

en: This isn't worth my time.
A math notebook. Nothing worth looking through.
zh_TW: 一本數學筆記。沒什麼好看的。

en: (Alright, so I need to search the school for the items first.)
zh_TW: (好，我應該先在學校找出我需要的物品。)

en: (The rune should be in this room...)
(...somewhere.)
Well, I need a tuft of hair for the ritual...
zh_TW: 好吧，我需要一束頭髮用來舉行儀式…

en: Should I cut my own hair?
zh_TW: 我應該剪下我自己的頭髮嗎？

en: I guess...
Forget it
Sigh...
Here I go, I suppose...
I never want to do that again.
You're so brave, Kat.
Of course not.
I already have enough hair.
zh_TW: 我已經有足夠的頭髮了。

en: (Nah.)
Um... any takers?
What do you need?
Just a bit of hair.
Why don't you cut your own?
zh_TW: 為什麼妳不剪妳自己的？

en: I thought you girls wanted to participate...?
zh_TW: 我以為妳們想要有參與感…？

en: I don't mind helping...
No Kaya, you don't have to do that.
zh_TW: 不，香耶，妳不需要這麼做。

en: It's alright, I'll give you mine.
zh_TW: 沒關係，我可以給妳我的。

en: There's no need for that. I'll just cut some of mine.
zh_TW: 沒有必要那麼做。剪我的就好。

en: Are you sure?
Yeah, it would be a waste to use yours.
zh_TW: 是啊，用妳的就太浪費了。

en: Alright.
A tuft of hair from Saki. She gave it to me voluntarily.
zh_TW: 一束沙紀的頭髮。她自願給我的。

en: Thanks!
Uuugh...
It's so dark...
Let's see what's behind this door.
Maybe we'll find exam answers!
Or dead bodies!
Or... maybe it's just a supply closet.
Heh.
